text: "Cruel Summer" is a popular song by Bananarama. It was released in 1984 in the United States. It charted higher around the United Kingdom after being released there one year before. The song is about sadness during the summer and wanting to be close to another person. Fourteen years after it came out, Ace of Base did an updated version of this classic. Category:Pop songs Category:1983 songs Category:Bananarama songs Category:Ace of Base songs
title: Cruel Summer
